贛.definition: abbr. for Jiangxi Province 江西省[Jiang1 xi1 Sheng3]; Gan River in Jiangxi Province 江西省[Jiang1 xi1 Sheng3]

贛州.definition: see 贛州市|赣州市[Gan4zhou1 Shi4]

贛州市.definition: Ganzhou, prefecture-level city in Jiangxi Province 江西省[Jiang1xi1 Sheng3]

贛江.definition: Gan River in Jiangxi Province 江西省[Jiang1 xi1 Sheng3]

贛語.definition: Gan dialect, spoken in Jiangxi Province
